Title: Parallel-propagating Fluctuations at Proton-kinetic Scales in the Solar Wind Are Dominated by Kinetic Instabilities
Abstract: © 2019. The American Astronomical Society. All rights reserved.We use magnetic helicity to characterize solar wind fluctuations at proton-kinetic scales from Wind observations. For the first time, we separate the contributions to helicity from fluctuations propagating at angles quasi-parallel and oblique to the local mean magnetic field,
